name: Element Visibility Toggler
author: Arron Schaar
description: Toggles an elements visibility.  By default the togglers works on the next sibling or a list of element IDs in the data-targetset attribute.

documentation.description: Toggles the element's next sibling OR a list of elements by ID via data-targetset.

attributes.data-targetset: A space separated list of elements IDs that the toggler controls.
attributes.data-toggle-state: Set the initial state of target(s).
